Description: Square inlay with circular inset: opaque red glass square for inlay. The central opening is inlaid with a seven-petal rosette in dark-blue glass set in bronze frames. Opaque orange sections cut to fill the interstices. From a naos.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Temple of Hathor (Dendara), Temple of Hathor
Bibliographic references: Tait 1991 / Five Thousand Years of Glass (pl.61)
